general_advisory: As per the forecast received from IMD, dry weather may prevail. Farmers are advised to irrigate their field and follow specific crop-related advices mentioned below.

advisory: To manage stem borer in paddy, use Trichogrammajaponicum card weekly for 6 times.
Apply Cartap Hydrochloride or Chlorantraniliprole or Imidacloprid for stem borer management.
To manage stem rot, drench soil with Validamycin or Captan + Hexaconazole.
For pest infestation, spray Neem Based Pesticide or chemical sprays like Thiamethoxam or Acetamiprid or Imidacloprid.
To manage powdery mildew, spray Sulphur or Hexaconazole or Propiconazole or Penconazole.
To manage powdery mildew, same methods as black gram.
For Early Blight management, spray Mancozeb or Carbendazim.
For late blight, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb at 10 days interval.
Favourable for Diamond Back Moth and Head Borer, collect caterpillars and egg masses, spray Neem based Pesticide or chemical sprays.
Control Aphid infestation by spraying neem oil formulation or Flonicam.
To manage Epilachna Beetle, shake plants, destroy grubs and pupae, spray neem-based pesticide or Chlorpyriphos or Profenophos.
To control thrips, spray Fenpyroximate or Abamactin.
Maintain water depth for hibernating of fish in warmer bottom zone.
